EmailTemplate.name: SGN_BRD_Chivas_Brotocal.Email - Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, It's Time for Another Party!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Gather your bros! The Chivas Brotocol is happening again at
Privé Clarke Quay, on 4th June 2016 at 9pm.
Get ready for another awesome bros' night out with exciting games
and exclusive Brotocol merchandise to be won!
Check out what went down at the last Chivas Brotocol Party <[[https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.1403532072993695.1073741878.392545357425710&type=3]]>
and remember to like Chivas Singapore Facebook <[[https://www.facebook.com/ChivasHongKong/?brand_redir=392545357425710]]> page.
It’s going to be bro-tastic. See you there!
If you no longer wish to receive these emails you may unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> at any time.
This is an automatically generated email, please do not reply.
